attributes.action: NHS to fund Intolerance Testing for IBS sufferers
attributes.additional_details:
Currently the NHS only offers allergy tests, Private companies offer intolerance testing with a simple blood test but for a hefty price. The government should make intolerance testing free on the NHS for IBS sufferers to identify the cause of the symptoms and allow IBS sufferers to cut out symptoms straight away.

If smokers, alcoholics and drug addicts can have free help why cant IBS sufferers? Why should we live in pain?
